text: My children enjoy the lessons very much. Their grades have improved a lot after attending the lessons in Mavis.

I would like to extend my heartfelt thanks to Ms. Joyce, the manager at Mavis, and all the teachers for their incredible support of my child, Tat Yuan, and our family.

I had the chance to speak with Ms. Joyce about my child, who had been struggling with low self-esteem and was reluctant to seek any form of help. Ms. Joyce reached out to him at just the right time, speaking with him and encouraging him to attend the tuition classes.

After each class, Ms. Joyce took the time to communicate with him, helping to strengthen his relationship with us. There were even times when she accompanied him home. She also made a point to call him before each class to remind him to attend.

Now, Tat Yuan is willing to go to his tuition classes at Mavis, and this positive change is entirely due to the support and care of Ms. Joyce and all the teachers.

Thanks to Ms Nette for explaining to us the classes.  My son easily feel at ease before starting his lessons.  ☺️
Mavis@Seletar Mall

The best tuition Center in the neighbourhood. My child enjoys his lesson for his past 6 years, warmly attend to by the Center
Head Miss Joyce and Miss Nat . Very personalised service and friendly. Great teaching materials and the children are in great hands. God bless Mavis Seletar Mall with great abundance of Grace , as they nurture the young generation .

Exceptional service! From the warm welcome to the prompt resolution of any issues, Centre Manager Joyce and her staff Nette impressed me at every step. Knowledgeable staffs, personalized attention, a genuine  commitment to customer satisfaction make them stand out. Highly recommended for a memorable and hassle-free satisfaction.
